articles.content:
“Asthma was found in 153 (6.75 per cent) subjects of the COVID-19-positive group and in 3388 (9.62 per cent) subjects of the COVID-19-negative group,” the study said.

articles.author: Reuters Staff
articles.title: Anti-vaxxer movement in UK is not growing, says health minister - Reuters India
articles.description: The anti-vaxxer movement in the United Kingdom is not growing and an increasing number of people want to have a vaccine against COVID-19, Health Secretary Matt Hancock said on Wednesday.
articles.content:
By Reuters Staff

articles.author: Express News Service
articles.title: More than 1/3rd of kids with Covid-19 show no symptoms: Study - The New Indian Express
articles.description: The research, published in the journal CMAJ, analysed results for 2,463 children in Alberta, Canada, who were tested during the first wave of the pandemic — March to September — for Covid-19 infection
articles.content: TORONTO:  More than one-third of kids infected with the novel coronavirus are asymptomatic, according to a study which confirms that children diagnosed with Covid-19 may represent just a fraction of … [+612 chars]
